title: config
description: Describes the config file for stm_inbox_flows app.

$schema.description: URL of the JSON schema. Specific to VSCode.

line_endings.description: Only LF line endings are allowed for consistency.

s3_bucket_private_reports.description: Name of the S3 bucket with report submissions

dev.description: Developer details with all reports merged into one index

job_queues.description: DB connection string, timeouts and other properties required to interact with DB-based job queues.

con_str.description: A PgSQL connection string to the job queues for processing dev reports and other tasks.

max_time_in_flight_dev.description: Maximum duration for an active DEV job before it is returned to the queue, in seconds.

max_number_of_fails.description: Maximum number of processing failures before the job stops being reprocessed. This value will be multiplied by `max_time_in_flight_*` to calculate the wait time before the job is requeued for every failure count.

flow.description: The default value for -flow param. Can be overridden by CLI args. Values: dev_queue

log_level.description: The default value for log level. Can be overridden by -l CLI arg.
